content.rendered:
Mission #042: No Survivors
Start Location Fallshore City, Mission HQ 1F – Pokémon Ranger at entrance
Unlock Requirements
  • Completed main story missions up until Fallshore City
  • Completed at least 5 Missions
Objectives Use the Trainer Catalogue and battle every Trainer
Reward Item: Latiosite or Latiasite (depending on player gender)

In the Fallshore Mission HQ, after completing at least 5 Missions, the Pokémon Ranger downstairs will give you a Trainer Catalogue and tell you to use it to track and defeat every Trainer in Borrius.

If you do so, you’ll be given a Latiosite or a Latiasite, depending on your gender.

Starting the Mission

The Mission HQ is on the west side of Fallshore City just north of the Marketplace.

If you’ve completed at least 5 Missions, speak to the Pokémon Ranger near the entrance and he’ll give you the Trainer Catalogue.

He wants you to use the Catalogue to find and defeat all 310 Trainers across Borrius, quite a considerable achievement.

How to Complete

Once you acquire the Catalogue, it’s in the Key Items section of your Cube.

The Catalogue keeps track of Trainers by route and marks routes off with a checkmark if they’ve been cleared of Trainers.

Even though you can accept this mission before becoming Pokémon Champion, you’ll need to wait until after you’re Champion to complete it, as some trainers will not challenge you until then.

If you manage to defeat all 310 Trainers in Borrius, return to the Pokémon Ranger and he’ll give you a Latiosite or a Latiasite, depending on your gender.

Back to: All Missions
